title.narrative: Midnimo (Unity) - Support For The Attainment Of Durable Solutions In Areas Impacted By Displacement And Returns In Jubaland And South West States

description.narrative: The overall outcome of this project the same as the overall vision of the Priority Plan which is to contribute to peace and stability in Somalia through the establishment of strong state-citizen links, based on community resilience and recovery efforts that are supported by responsive state institutions, to achieve the dual aim of providing peace dividends and strengthen trust in the political transition.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Local and national governments and other Habitat Agenda Partners have improved tools and approaches for increased security of tenure for vulnerable groups, women, youth, IDPs and indigenous peoples

title.narrative: Percentage of the project beneficiaries who observed/experienced enhanced social cohesion and trust among the communities as a result of the project * Percentage of returnees, IDPs and host community members who express improvement in their perceptions of their physical safety and security

title.narrative: Number of community members who participated in the community planning sessions through the project disaggregated by gender and socio-economic status * Community action plans are in place per target district * Number of district and/or community level government representatives trained and included in the core facilitation group for community consultations * Number of CAGs and CBM&Es formed and the number of participants disaggregated by gender
